asset.title: SPY 2015 SNOW - EERO NIEMELA
asset.description:
Equipped with a signature SPY Doom goggle this year, pro snowboarder Eero Niemela will surely SEE HAPPY. Featuring the color and contrast enhancing Happy Lens™ technology, easily distinguish changes in terrain and experience an instantly happier view of the world with Eero’s signature SPY Doom. Go ahead, SEE HAPPY. 

SHOP HAPPY at http://www.spyoptic.com
asset.author: spyoptic
